Generation IX.Scarlet: It absorbs nutrients from cave walls. The petals it wears are made of crystallized poison.
Generation IX.Violet: Glimmet's toxic mineral crystals look just like flower petals. This Pokémon scatters poisonous powder like pollen to protect itself.
